original_text: And Ahithophel was the king's counsellor: and Hushai the Archite was the king's companion:
korean_text: 아히도벨은 왕의 모사가 되었고 아렉 사람 후새는 왕의 벗이 되었고

sentences.original_text: And Ahithophel was the king's counsellor:
and Hushai the Archite was the king's companion:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아르케 사람 후새는 왕의 친구였습니다:
